Stargazer Data API
Table of Contents

Namespace Stargazer

Classes

ASTRALPLANEAlbedo

Handles the transparency of the floor.

AzimuthButton

Contains the button used to toggle the azimuth lines

AzimuthGridlines

The graphic object used to draw the lines.

CompassNeedle

Displays a compass needle to orient the user relative to North.

ConstellationButton

Contains the button used to toggle the constellations in the viewport.

ConstellationLabel

Displays the constellation name.

Constellations

The Godot.Node3D used to contain the constellation stars and lines in the viewport.

Globals
LabelButton

Contains the button used to toggle the constellation labels.

LabelNode

Contains the constellation label.

Main

Contains the main camera used to create the user view.

MessierButton

Contains the button used to toggle the visibility of the Messier Deep Space Objects

SkyView

The parent object for all items in the viewport. Responsible for relaying notifications from senders throughout the program into the view port.

Spawner

Draws all stars that are not a part of constellations

Star

A star that has been converted from Horizontal Coordinate form, into Godot coordinate form and drawn to the screen.

StarMesh

This was originally created to explore adding color to the stars. The current implementation is way too aggressive. We might be able to make this work by tweaking the numbers.

Startup

The top level controller for the program. Handles all communication between the GUI and the viewport.

Structs

MessierButton.HuntsvilleCoordinates
Made with docfx
